arts.ttl: Napoli Ace Underlines His Ambition to Return to Italy Squad
arts.sum: Napoli winger Matteo Politano laid the groundwork for a dominant 2-0 home victory against Monza at the Diego Maradona Stadium. The 31-year-old opened the scoring before Khvicha Kvaratskhelia sealed the deal midway through the first half. arts.sum: Antonio Conte has done unimaginable things at Napoli since taking charge of the three-time Serie A champions in the summer. arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Monza: Politano Top, Lukaku Flop
arts.sum: Napoli ascended to the top of the Serie A standings with a comfortable 2-0 home victory against out-of-form Monza on Sunday evening. A quick-fire first-half double from Matteo Politano and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia secured three points for Antonio Conte's title-bidding squad. arts.ttl: Serie A | Napoli 2-0 Monza: Match Report
arts.sum: Napoli have surged to the top of the Serie A table following a commanding 2-0 victory against Monza at the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Goals from Matteo Politano and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia secured the win for Antonio Conte’s side, who continue to impress under their new manager. Despite the absence of first-choice goalkeeper Alex Meret due to a muscular injury, Napoli dominated the match from the outset. The home side’s breakthrough came when Politano capitalized on a fortunate deflection to score from a tight angle, marking his first goal since April.
